General.Name: Shenzhen Agricultural Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Agricultural Products Group Co.,Ltd invests, operates, and manages wholesale markets of agricultural products in China. It also distributes agricultural products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Agricultural Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Agricultural Products Group Co.,Ltd in November 2018. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
